title: [Unturned 3.14.5.0] 更新记录
author: lichi2050
txt_content:
本帖最后由 lichi2050 于 2016-2-22 13:01 编辑 

Steam: http://store.steampowered.com/news/?appids=304930
Unturned Forum: http://unturned-forum.com/threads/3-14-5-0-update-notes.5044/
部分翻译: http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-559147-1-1.html
3.14.5.0 Rocket: http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-543521-1-1.html

Additions/添加
Added civilian armor vest. [ID 1168] 添加民用装甲背心. [ID 1168] Added spec ops outfit. [IDs 1169-1172] 添加特种部队装备. [IDs 1169-1172] Added makeshift armor. [ID 1173] 添加临时护甲（一种护甲服装）. [ID 1173] Added scythe. [ID 1174] 添加镰刀. [ID 1174] Added chart. [ID 1175] 添加chart（暂译为海图/手绘地图）. [ID 1175] Added GPS. [ID 1176] 添加 GPS（可查看卫星图）. [ID 1176] Added diving gear. [IDs 1178-1181] 添加潜水服. [IDs 1178-1181] Added dufflebag. [IDs 1182-1189] 添加旅行袋. [IDs 1182-1189] Added burst fire mode, enabled on eaglefire. 添加burst fire mode（突发模式/三连发模式），可在使用eaglefire枪械时启动.Added bullet trails when shooting without muzzle brake. 射击时不带制退器/消焰器的枪械会显示子弹轨迹.Added map info to selection screen. 地图选择界面添加地图信息.Added new note to Montague. Montague（PEI地图内的一个小镇）添加新的文档.Added ability to use items while swimming. 添加游泳时可使用物品的能力.Added workshop errors tool to help identify simple bugs in custom content. 添加workshop errors tool（创意工坊检测错误工具）可以帮助玩家检查一些因自定义内容引起的简单的报错.Added bundle tool to Sources/Tools folder.添加工具包至Sources/Tools文件夹.
Improvements/优化
Improved stars blending from midnight to dawn. 优化午夜到黎明时的星星.Improved attachments to show arrow quality. 优化箭头，现在箭头与耐久值同步.Improved character UV layout. 优化玩家UV设置.Improved suicide and drowning deaths to not get new spawn point. 优化自杀和溺死不会重生.Improved refilling canteens ease.优化行军壶补充速度.
Tweaks/调整
Tweaked PEI Arena spawn locations.调整PEI地图内竞技场玩家生成点坐标.Tweaked Washington spacecraft crash to have deadzone.调整Washington（华盛顿）的飞碟坠毁，造成病毒死亡区.Tweaked last suppressor shot to stay suppressed.调整带消音器的枪械射出的最后一发子弹仍会带有消音属性.Tweaked playerlist to show skillset.调整玩家列表显示职业.Tweaked created Arena maps to show in singleplayer list.调整自制的竞争场地图可以显示在单人模式列表了.Tweaked sand color a bit darker.调整沙子颜色变得暗了一点.Tweaked firefighter/police skillsets.调整firefighter（消防员）/police（警察）职业技能.Tweaked exercise/diving skills.调整了exercise（优化移动速度）/diving（潜水） 技能.
Fixes/修复
Fixed buildable save corruption issue, restored files.修复建材信息保存损坏，现在可以恢复这些文件.Fixed keeping empty nailgun magazines.修复nailgun（射钉枪）保持全空状态.Fixed crafting nailgun magazines together.修复填装时会将多个nailgun（射钉枪）合成到一起.Fixed map zooming past first level.修复放大地图不会加载最初的地形.Fixed campfire audio poor looping.修复campfire（营火）音效无法循环.Fixed duplicate item drops in singleplayer.修复单人模式掉落复制物品（更准确的说是刷物品）.Fixed Arena maps in singleplayer.修复单人模式的竞争场地图问题.Fixed keeping arrow when shot misses.修复射偏时，箭头依旧显示已射出.Fixed impact particle smoothness.修复粒子效果流畅度.Fixed losing all xp in Horde mode.修复Horde mode（尸潮模式）死亡后掉落全部XP（经验值）.Fixed some texture unloading issues.修复部分材质无法加载.Fixed duplicate nailgun blueprint.修复刷nailgun（射钉枪）的合成方式.Fixed impact bubbles shader.修复气泡的着色器/光影.Fixed border difference in satellite map.修复satellite map（卫星地图）地图边境区别.

Tip for level creators: You can customize the colors used for your road map by overriding the Charts file with either your own bundle or one copied from the other default maps. 
通知地图制作者们: 你现在可以自定义修改Charts文件，修改小地图中的路线颜色，你可以使用你自己的bundle文件或从默认地图中复制出来.

If you have created some custom workshop content please check out the new logs tool on the main menu! It will let you know if there are any potential issues/misconfigured files.
如果你制作中一些创意工坊内容的话，请在主界面中选择logs工具! 它会让你知道你制作的内容是否存在一些问题/配置错误 的文件.

不好意思，这么久才翻译完，最近实在是有点忙，昨晚翻了一半就倒下了，如有错误，还望指出.
